images.caption: Figure 2:Overview of the Segment Anything Model in 4D (SAM4D) workflow.The image and LiDAR encoders generate modality-specific embeddings, which are aligned through the proposedUnified Multi-modal Positional Encoding. TheMotion-aware Cross-modal Memory Attentionthen processes multi-modal and temporal features, incorporating ego-motion for improved feature interaction. Finally, the updated image and LiDAR features are queried efficiently by mask decoder with diverse input prompts from various modalities.
